column5: Good one!  Don't forget the pork and beans ... that fuels us up so we can burn some gas to propel us forward quicker than we can paddle.  Works like a charm.
Love how they talk up the peace and tranquility... then throw a jet drive motor at it !  I can see the Bunk reports now...
I couldn't bring you. That would tax it's abilities. Besides, we'd look two mushrooms growing out of a sidewalk crack.  JF
Do kayakers drink beer? What do you think we put on our granola?
It isn't in the same price range, but you should look at the Mad River Synergy. It's sort of a SOT kayak/canoe hybrid. The 14' would be plenty for your weight. Mad River Synergy 14
